description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values
help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

all.message: aria-errormessage value `id-message-1` must use a technique to announce the message (e.g., aria-live, aria-describedby, role=alert, etc.)

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  aria-errormessage value `id-message-1` must use a technique to announce the message (e.g., aria-live, aria-describedby, role=alert, etc.)
